app.text_info: This app is created by locals and experts. As you can see, it's also free of charge. Please let us know if you want to contribute with your experience, enrich the content, correct inaccuracies, or submit pictures.
app.text_acknowledge: This quick app is an open-source project powered by open data and enriched by the community. Most of the information was extracted from Wikidata, OpenStreetMaps, and other public sources. You can find inaccuracies, so we apologize in advance.
app.text_feedback: Please let us know if you want to contribute with your experience, enrich the content, correct inaccuracies, or submit pictures. This app is created by locals and experts.

pois.name: Right of Passage
pois.more: The right of passage shows the right of passage from one social or religious status to another. Some of the most crucial examples are connected with birth, reproduction and death. These are universal and suggest that they go back many years ago. There is a superstition that if you pass through the arch before you graduate from Spring Hill that you will not graduate.

pois.name: St. Ignatius
pois.description: He was the founder of the Society of Jesus and the statue has fragments from the Mamresa cave where he composed the spiritual exercises. Known for its missionary, educational, and charitable works, the Jesuit order was a leading force in the modernizing of the Roman Catholic Church.
